prompt: Create a sophisticated loading page with a company branding approach featuring a large circular progress indicator with custom styling. Use a soft off-white background (0xFFFAFAFA) and position an oversized progress indicator (size controlled by SizedBox 60x60) with orange color (0xFFFF9800) and thick stroke (strokeWidth: 5.0) at the center. Below the indicator, display a two-line text layout: 'AppName' as a bold title (fontSize: 24, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold) in dark gray (0xFF212121), followed by 'Loading your experience...' as a subtitle (fontSize: 14) in medium gray (0xFF757575), with 16 pixels spacing between title and subtitle, and 32 pixels from the progress indicator.
